name: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Learn the core concepts of JavaScript and start creating dynamic, interactive web pages. Understand variables, functions, events, and loops.
whatYouLearn: Use variables, data types, and operators
Manipulate HTML elements using the DOM

exercises.title: Print Message with JavaScript
exercises.description: Learn how to display text using JavaScript in the browser console.
exercises.theory: The console.log() function prints output to the browser console. It is a useful tool for debugging and testing JavaScript code.
hints: Use single or double quotes for strings

exercises.title: Functions and Variables
exercises.description: Understand variables and functions by writing a simple addition program.
exercises.theory: JavaScript uses 'let' and 'const' for declaring variables. Functions are defined using the function keyword and can return values.
exercises.objective: Create a function that adds two numbers and prints the result.

requirements: Return the sum of two numbers
hints: Use return to send the result back
Functions are defined using 'function name()' syntax
